targets.expr:
sum(rate(client_requests_seconds_count{m_application="$application", pod_name=~"$pod_name", name="$client", type="total", status="success"}[$window]))
/sum(rate(client_requests_seconds_count{m_application="$application", pod_name=~"$pod_name", name="$client", type="total"}[$window]))
max by (endpoint,quantile)(client_requests_seconds{m_application="$application", pod_name=~"$pod_name", name="$client", status="success", type="raw"})

panels.description:
raw - a single http level request.

total - a single api level request including retries (1 or more raw requests).
panels.title: Successful request rates (per type)
Failed request rates (per type and status)

panels.description: failure rate threshold is the configured value for the client.
panels.title: Circuit failure rate

panels.description: slow call rate threshold is the configured value for the client.
panels.title: Circuit slow requests ratio

panels.description:
raw - a single http level request.

total - a single api level request including retries (1 or more raw requests).
panels.title: Request retry rates

targets.expr: max by (endpoint,pod_name)(client_requests_seconds{m_application="$application", pod_name=~"$pod_name", name="$client", quantile="$percentile", type="raw"})
